metadata.title: USN-6307-1 -- JOSE for C/C++ vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that JOSE for C/C++ AES GCM decryption routine incorrectly uses the Tag length from the actual Authentication Tag provided in the JWE. An attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system crash) or might expose sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6307-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libcjose0 - 0.6.0+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 libcjose-dev - 0.6.0+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
